about.title: About Company
about.description: TradesAdvisor is a fintech company bringing together the expertise of traders, analysts and developers. We build tools for those seeking precision, flexibility and automation in financial markets.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: We are a team of traders, analysts and developers using machine learning and algorithms to identify market opportunities.

tech.title: Our Technology
tech.description: We don‚Äôt try to guess the market‚Äîwe model its behavior based on objective data, statistical methods and algorithmic analysis. Our goal is to provide users with structured information and tools to make independent decisions in a fast-changing market environment.

philosophy.slogan: We don‚Äôt guess the market‚Äîwe model it

empowerment.title: Client Empowerment
points: Our goal is to provide you with the best ideas and a systematic approach‚Äîyou make the decisions.
You manage the account‚Äîwe provide analytical scenarios based on models and statistics.

approach.title: Our Approach
points: All ideas are based on many years of experience in trading, investing, machine learning and market statistics.
You can disable the service at any time‚Äîwe offer a proven path.

notice.title: Important Notice
notice.description: Our services are not offered to U.S. persons or residents of the U.S. By accessing this site or using our services, you confirm that you are not a ‚ÄúU.S. person‚Äù under Regulation S of the Securities Act of 1933.

stats.title: Strategy Performance Metrics

stats.disclaimer: Historical model performance (backtests) is provided for informational purposes only. Past results do not guarantee future performance. These are simulations, not live trades.

metrics.drawdown: Maximum decline from peak to trough

metrics.avgWinLoss: Ratio of average win to average loss
metrics.exposure: Percent of time in open positions

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most popular questions about our services

items.question: Do you provide investment management or discretionary trading?
items.answer: No, we only offer consulting services. All trading decisions and operations are made by the client.

items.question: How do you charge for your services?
items.answer: Our fee structure is performance‚Äëbased and disclosed individually in the consultation agreement. We do not charge asset management fees nor access client funds.

items.question: Where are the funds held?
items.answer: All client funds remain in the client‚Äôs brokerage accounts; we have no access or control.
